I have set up Heretrix to crawl roughly around 100 domains. One of the
doma=
ins in the seed has a huge number of redirect links (301's). 
Upon looking =
at my crawl output I am seeing that there are 1,244
"successful" pages out =
of 77,936 pages crawled for this domain.All the
rest seem to be 301 redirec=
ts. In this case I would have expected to
see a similar (approx 77,000) num=
ber of 200 responses that would have
been crawled.
Any ideas on why the "su=
ccessful" page count is so low in this case?
